ovdesc.p: Parameter table releted to linked T24 databases.
It contains details of external companies present in other T24 databases to which this database can exchange data.
It is used to prevent a company being created which already exists in another T24 entity.

desc.p: A company code in this T24 database normally the master company
A description of the external company
Part of the multi valued associationof GAC.ACCOUNT to MNEMONIC
Company present in an external T24 database
Part of the multi valued associationof GAC.ACCOUNT to MNEMONIC
The mnemonic of the external company
Part of the multi valued associationof GAC.ACCOUNT to MNEMONIC
